data.text: @CarolinaThinks Nope, just pointing out how ridiculous your statements are.
@StagedSelf This is another unintelligent remark that reflects an inability to think critically and argue persuasively.

@StagedSelf Right. They can. That’s why they’ll see you made an accusation about “Alternate facts” then went silent when I shared the NYT, the CDC director, and told you my questions came from reviewing CDC data (& state & local health depts)

You went quiet, then you called me stupid.
@CarolinaThinks Oh the thread is public, anyone can go to it to see *exactly* what I said.
@CarolinaThinks The right to spread and contract a disease?
@StagedSelf @nel2008 Plus…..hahahhahahahaha….total crimes against humanity (wait…..nope that’s Putin)
@StagedSelf @nel2008 Sounds like your a rational human…..others….lack the rational part.

@StagedSelf “New Zealand High Court ENDS Jacinda Ardern’s Vaccine Mandate: “It’s a Gross Violation of Human Rights”

https://t.co/VdT2LtZcUI
@StagedSelf It doesn’t make it safer. It’s discrimination and a violation of human rights.
